channel.title: Comments on: Weeks Ten to Twelve

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2014/09/weeks-ten-to-twelve/#comment-434393">Will</a>.
I did, which were $$$ but worth it. The key is to use the Mazda rivets because they have the right torque on them and won't distort the skin.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Will.

I did, which were $$$ but worth it. The key is to use the Mazda rivets because they have the right torque on them and won’t distort the skin.

item.title: By: Will
item.dc:creator: Will
item.description:
Eric did you buy new mounting brackets and rivets from mazda to tackle this install ? I'd like to avoid the unflush bumper skin you mentioned.
Thanks !
item.content:encoded:
Eric did you buy new mounting brackets and rivets from mazda to tackle this install ? I’d like to avoid the unflush bumper skin you mentioned.

Thanks !

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2014/09/weeks-ten-to-twelve/#comment-100004">Will</a>.
Nope, I rebought the '99 rebar to go along with this bumper as well :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Will.

Nope, I rebought the ’99 rebar to go along with this bumper as well :-)

item.title: By: Will
item.dc:creator: Will
item.description: Exciting updates! Were you planning on using the 93 bumper beam with the 99 spec bumper skin this time around? Just curious if you forsee any fitment issues.
item.content:encoded: Exciting updates! Were you planning on using the 93 bumper beam with the 99 spec bumper skin this time around? Just curious if you forsee any fitment issues.

item.title: By: albert
item.dc:creator: albert
item.description: i dont think my body is ready for this jelly
item.content:encoded: i dont think my body is ready for this jelly
